tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Wait time,Value for money,
review: I have been seeing Dr. Vakil since Jan 2017 when I met with an accident with severe injuries on my face where my lower Jaw was completely crushed and had to undergo a facial trauma. But to my rescue, my case was handled by Vakil, he did a maxillofacial surgery and now my face almost looks like the original even after handling 30 fractures. He was kind, humorous and had incredible ‘bed-side’ manner. Discussing my medical condition with him was like talking to an old friend. The follow-up from his side was really excellent, cannot be explained in words, as he was always available in calls whenever needed. I am still under his care as I am getting treated for dental implants at his clinic, Yatha dental care. He gives you a complete picture of treatment so that we can just sit and relax by completely trusting him with the top class facility and expertise that he has at the clinic. The nightmare of my illness is now slowly becoming a dream of recovery. Credit goes to this wonderful doctor who changed my destiny. I would recommend him to the core.

tags: None
review: I know Dr. Vakil from 27th of September 2016. I was admitted in the hospital as a result of an accident that shattered my face and jaws almost completely. I'm really lucky to be under his care. He is a great human being and an absolutely great doctor. I'm back to my regular life thanks to him. Me and my family are thankful to Dr. Vakil, without whom my recovery from that incident wouldn't be possible. I'm still under his care and getting treated for my broken teeth in his clinic. Yatha dental clinic is a top class facility with a lot of equipment for advanced dental treatment. I'm still undergoing treatment and I'm feeling better already.

tags: None
review: I had an accident that shattered my face and jaws. Dr. Vakil did my facial reconstruction and Thanks to his care I look like I was before accident. Now I approached Dr. Vakil for my dental treatment for my shattered teeth and he is taking great care of me and the treatment is top class as usual and his clinic has all the advanced equipment. I recommend Dr. Vakil to anyone with absolute confidence.

review: Really good doctor. Gives good explanations of issues and procedures, and does a very good analysis of the issue before going in to surgery. I was very comfortable knowing I was in good hands. I am very happy with his service, and would definitely recommend to anyone.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Bone Grafting for Dental Implants,implant removal,
review: ****** ***** ** * ****** ************** ****** ******* *** **** ** ***** ******* I have not seen such a nice doctor even in other medical fields. He spends lot of time with patients in explaining all the details and fills confidence. I lost my dental bone and suffered a lot of pain due to terrible mistake done by one of the top most doctor in Pune, this East Street Pune doctor put local made 32 mm hieght implants in my mouth for high cost (25k for each implant) though there was not enough bone there, and they had to be extracted due to less bone and other complications. Luckily I found doctor Vakil, he has been treating me for some time and I am very happy with him. He follows evidence based treatment that gave me a lot of confidence. My treatment will go for some time and I am sure I will be happy with the outcome.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Dental Implant Fixing,Dental Fillings,Dental Crowns,Dental X-Ray,Dental Examinations,
review: I know Dr.Vakil from Jan 2017, he is very friendly,Down to earth,humble to each and every patient...Recently, I had met with an accident where my chin and teeth got injured..My case is taken up by Dr vakil and the way he handled is incredible...I went through a chin surgery with advanced technology ever used and an implant surgery one month later...Now my chin is healed completely and became so normal as if there is no such injury over there. Teeth treatment is still going on.. Doctor explains each and every step of treatment clearly and He does treat the patient with utmost care... Equipment at yatha dental care is at high level...For any dental  issues, I would strongly recommend Dr.vakil :)
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words
